example.name: passive
example.text: '' Or the one in which she and Josh are stranded [*-1] in the city [*T*-3] , and , after [*-2] insisting on separate motel rooms , she knocks on his door [*-2] to pour out her feelings about the rape -- [*-2] wearing nothing but a mini-slip and a push-up bra [*T*-3] .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Bus schedules were sometimes in disarray , [*] stranding commuters such as Marilyn Sullivan .
